bio: Greetings, traveler of knowledge. I am Thelsa Andalas, a venerable Dunmer alchemist of the College of Winterhold, dedicated to the art and science of alchemy. My journey into the mystical realm of alchemy began amidst the ashen landscapes of Morrowind, where I honed my skills under the tutelage of Telvani Masters. In the hallowed halls of Winterhold, I have served as a beacon of alchemical wisdom for decades, nurturing the minds of aspiring alchemists who seek to unravel the secrets of nature through the manipulation of ingredients. My pedagogy emphasizes the intricate balance of elements, the discernment of subtle properties, and the harmonious synthesis of concoctions. My renown extends far beyond the frosty borders of Skyrim, as elites from distant corners of Tamriel send forth their requests for potions and elixirs crafted by my skilled hands. From the bustling markets of Cyrodiil to the distant shores of Summerset, the name Thelsa Andalas is synonymous with quality and expertise in alchemical craft.
name: Thelsa Andalas
